Generate block design

generate_blocks.Rd

Generate block design

generate_blocks(
  .tbl,
  k,
  ...,
  .name = "Batch",
  .prefix = "B",
  .control = list()
)

Arguments

.tbl

a tibble (or data.frame).
k

number of batches (blocks), a single integer, a vector of batch lengths, or a vector of batch IDs.
...

columns to select (see dplyr::select()).
.name

name of the batch (block) column.
.prefix

prefix of batch values ("B" for B1, B2, etc.).
.control

list of arguments for optFederov and optBlock.

Value

sample list with the batch

Examples

Contents
